item.title: [RS2] Anti Logout 2.2
item.dc:creator: @Bumis Bumis
item.description:
@Bumis wrote:

For those who know me from old communitys, as an ex Reinet Admin, or even rscheatnet. You should know I’m back to Runescape, and back to SCAR Scripting.

This script works undetected on Runescape, even running through the official website. Everything is 100% Random.
I use it to auto my accounts by leaving my accounts logged in at the Thugs under edgeville in level two wilderness. It simulates a human sitting there, moving the mouse around.

It’s got basic Random Event detection, for when private chat is off. (Optional Boolean switch), Option Boolean Switch to make it do Special Attack when it has the energy, and many other features you’ll just hafta try it out I guess.

Line 29.

{
  +  Written by Bumis /// Anti-Logout 2.2 {March 12, 2006)
       - Simulates a person playing the game, while keeping you logged in. Useful to keep you logged on
       while hostile monsters attack you. Among many other things. Complex mode for when you want to go
       AFK, and run Simple mode when you're playing the game and not wanting to accidently get logged out.
}
//Setup, line 29!!!
//Just start typing to pause the script
//backspace the text to unpause!
program AntiLogOut;
 var
//Mouse Integers
   X,Y: Integer;
  
//Procedure Integers
   MoveCount,MoveTimes,MouseTimes: Integer;     {MouseMode Variables}
   ScatterCount,ScatterTimes: Integer;          {ScatterMode Variables}
   CM,WhereTo,EnterCM,mm: Integer;              {CloseMouse Variables}
   StatCount,StatTimes: Integer;                {Check Stat Variables}
   RingCount,RingRepeat,RingNumber: Integer;    {Ring Variables}
   PauseCount: Integer;                         {Pause Variables}
   DoSpecial,SpecialUsed: Integer;              {Special Attack Variables}
//Case Statement Integers
   WhichStats,FightSet,TOL,reviewcount: Integer;
//Switches
   Mode,Combat,Click,RingOn,ScatterMode: Boolean;
   MouseMode,Paused,SpecialOn,EventFind: Boolean;

Procedure Setup;
begin
// Main Settings
    Mode :=True;     //True-Complex Script Mode, False-Simple Script Mode.
    Click:=True;     //Set this to true if you want the script to click to seem more human like.
    TOL:=10          //General script color finding tolerance, recommended 5-15
// Combat Settings
    Combat:=False;   //Enable to set combat mode automatically.
    FightSet:=2      //Pick Combat Mode.
    SpecialOn:=False;//True, if you want to do random special attacks.
    
// Security Settings
    RingOn:=True;    //Enables ringing sound to alert you when ringnumber is reached.
    RingNumber:=65   //Ringnumber is aprox how many times the mouse will move before the script alerts you. +Random(5)
    EventFind:=True  //Searchs for random events, you must turn public chat off for this to be effective! {Makes noise if it finds it}
end;

Procedure ClickSomething;
Begin
 MoveMouseSmooth(555+Random(185),179+Random(15))
 Wait(800+Random(400))
 GetMousePos(x,y)
 ClickMouse(x,y,true)
 Wait(2000+Random(200))
 Status('Opening a random area.')
End;

Procedure Throwoff;
VAR
T2: Integer;
begin
wait(20+random(25))
GetMousePos(x,y)
T2:=Random(4)
 Case T2 of
  1: MoveMouseSmooth(x+Random(4),y+random(4))
  2: MoveMouseSmooth(x-Random(4),y-Random(4))
  3: MoveMouseSmooth(x+Random(4),y-Random(4))
  4: MoveMouseSmooth(x-Random(4),y+Random(4))
 End;
end;

Procedure Ring;
Begin
RingRepeat:=0
 Repeat
  Status('Ring!')
  playsound('C:\WINDOWS\Media\ringin.wav');
  Wait(700+Random(900))
  RingRepeat:=RingRepeat+1
  RingCount:=0
 Until(RingRepeat>2+Random(3))
End;

Procedure Review;
Begin
ReviewCount:=ReviewCount+1
 If ScatterMode=True then
  Begin
   GetMousePos(x,y)
   Writeln('')
   Writeln('')
   Writeln('')
   Writeln('')
   Writeln('')
   If Paused=True Then
   Begin
    Writeln('Report Information - Paused')
   End;
   If Paused=False Then
   Begin
    Writeln('Report Information - Unpaused')
   End;
   Writeln('')
   Writeln('Mousemode (Off -  ' + IntToStr(MouseTimes) +')         Scattermode (On -  ' + IntToStr(ScatterTimes) +')')
   Writeln('Mouse Movements (' + IntToStr(MoveCount) + ')          Scatter Movements (' + IntToStr(ScatterCount) + ')         Mouse Position (' + IntToStr(x) + ',' + IntToStr(y) + ')')
   Writeln('Ring Count (' + IntToStr(RingCount) + '/' + IntToStr(RingNumber) + ')            Stat Checks (' + IntToStr(StatCount) + ')               Reviews Printed (' + IntToStr(ReviewCount) + ')')
   Writeln('Special Attacks Used: (' + IntToStr(SpecialUsed) + ')')
   If Combat=True Then
   Writeln('Fight Select (On)            FightMode(' + IntToStr(fightset) + ')')
   If EventFind=True Then
    Writeln('Random Event Check: (Enabled)')
   If EventFind=False Then
    Writeln('Random Event Check: (Disabled)')
  end;
 If MouseMode=True then
  Begin
   GetMousePos(x,y)
   Writeln('')
   Writeln('')
   Writeln('')
   Writeln('')
   Writeln('')
   If Paused=True Then
   Begin
    Writeln('Report Information - Paused')
   End;
   If Paused=False Then
   Begin
    Writeln('Report Information - Unpaused')
   End;
   Writeln('')
   Writeln('Mousemode (On -  ' + IntToStr(MouseTimes) +')          Scattermode (Off -  ' + IntToStr(ScatterTimes) +')')
   Writeln('Mouse Movements (' + IntToStr(MoveCount) + ')          Scatter Movements (' + IntToStr(ScatterCount) + ')         Mouse Position (' + IntToStr(x) + ',' + IntToStr(y) + ')')
   Writeln('Ring Count (' + IntToStr(RingCount) + '/' + IntToStr(RingNumber) + ')            Stat Checks (' + IntToStr(StatCount) + ')               Reviews Printed (' + IntToStr(ReviewCount) + ')')
   Writeln('Special Attacks Used: (' + IntToStr(SpecialUsed) + ')')
   If Combat=True Then
   Writeln('Fight Select (On)            FightMode(' + IntToStr(fightset) + ')')
   If EventFind=True Then
    Writeln('Random Event Check: (Enabled)')
   If EventFind=False Then
    Writeln('Random Event Check: (Disabled)')
  End;
 If ReviewCount>25+Random(25) then
  begin
   if Click=True Then
    Begin
     ClickSomething;
     ReviewCount:=0
    End;
  End;
end;

Procedure PauseScript;
Begin
Paused:=True
Review;
 Repeat
  Wait(2000+random(50))
  status('Script Paused')
 Until(not (FindColorTolerance(x,y,16711680,133,438,160,445,10)))
Paused:=False;
End;

Procedure CloseMouse;
Begin
 CM:=0
 MoveMouseSmooth(6+Random(760),6+Random(500))
 Repeat
  Status('Running CloseMouse')
  CM:=CM+1
  WhereTo:=Random(4)
   Case WhereTo Of
    1:
     Begin
      GetMousePos(x,y)
      MoveMouseSmooth(x+random(5),y+random(5))
     End;
    2:
     Begin
      GetMousePos(x,y)
      MoveMouseSmooth(x-Random(5),y-random(5))
     End;
    3:
     Begin
      GetMousePos(x,y)
      MoveMouseSmooth(x+random(5),y-Random(5))
     End;
    4:
     Begin
      GetMousePos(x,y)
      MoveMouseSmooth(x-Random(5),y+random(5))
     End;
   End;
 Until(CM>10+Random(12))
EnterCM:=0
Throwoff;
End;

Procedure SetStats;
Begin
 If (Not (FindColorTolerance(x,y,2763390,574,172,597,196,TOL))) Then
  Begin
   EnterCM:=EnterCM+1
   Status('Opening Stats')
   Wait(1000+Random(1000))
   MoveMouseSmooth(577+Random(14),179+random(14))
   Wait(1000+Random(600))
   GetMousePos(x,y)
   ClickMouse(x,y,true)
   Wait(2000+Random(600))
   if EnterCM>2+Random(2) then
    begin
     CloseMouse;
    End;
  End;
End;

Procedure RandomEventCheck;
Begin;
 If EventFind=True Then
  Begin
   Status('Searching for a random event')
   If FindColorTolerance(x,y,65535,28,43,458,303,2) Then
    Begin
     Status('Random Event Found!!!!!!!!')
     playsound('C:\WINDOWS\Media\Notify.wav');
     Wait(3000+random(200))
     playsound('C:\WINDOWS\Media\Notify.wav');
     Wait(3000+random(200))
     playsound('C:\WINDOWS\Media\Notify.wav');
     Wait(3000+random(200))
     playsound('C:\WINDOWS\Media\Notify.wav');
    End;
  End;
End;

Procedure FightSetPro;
Begin
 Status('Setting FightMode')
 MoveMouseSmooth(554+Random(22),177+Random(19))
 Wait(500+Random(300))
 GetMousePos(x,y)
 ClickMouse(x,y,True)
 Wait(1000+Random(600))
  Case Fightset Of
   1:
     Begin
      Status('FightSet 1 Selected')
      Wait(1000+Random(600))
      MoveMouseSmooth(567+Random(50),272+Random(21))
      Wait(500+Random(500))
      GetMousePos(x,y)
      ClickMouse(x,y,true)
      Wait(2000+Random(600))
      Writeln('FightMode Set')
     End;
   2:
     Begin
      Status('FightSet 2 Selected')
      Wait(1000+Random(600))
      MoveMouseSmooth(567+Random(50),316+Random(21))
      Wait(500+Random(500))
      GetMousePos(x,y)
      ClickMouse(x,y,true)
      Wait(2000+Random(600))
      Writeln('FightMode Set')
     End;
   3:
     Begin
      Status('FightSet 3 Selected')
      Wait(1000+Random(600))
      MoveMouseSmooth(567+Random(50),336+Random(21))
      Wait(500+Random(500))
      GetMousePos(x,y)
      ClickMouse(x,y,true)
      Wait(2000+Random(600))
      Writeln('FightMode Set')
     End;
   4:
     Begin
      Status('FightSet 4 Selected')
      Wait(1000+Random(600))
      MoveMouseSmooth(567+Random(50),395+Random(21))
      Wait(500+Random(500))
      GetMousePos(x,y)
      ClickMouse(x,y,true)
      Wait(2000+Random(600))
      Writeln('FightMode Set')
     End;
  End;
 Wait(2000+Random(888))
 SetStats;
End;

Procedure Scatter;
Begin
Status('Running ScatterMode!')
ScatterTimes:=ScatterTimes+1
Review;
Throwoff;
RandomEventCheck;
 Repeat
  If FindColorTolerance(x,y,16711680,133,438,160,445,10) then
   begin
    PauseScript;
   end;
  Status('Running ScatterMode!')
  ScatterMode:=True
  MouseMode:=False
  Review;
  ScatterCount:=ScatterCount+1
  Wait(100+Random(1000))
  MoveMouseSmooth(6+Random(760),6+Random(500))
  Review;
  Status('Running ScatterMode!')
 Until(ScatterCount>20+Random(20))
End;

Procedure StatCheck;
Begin
 If Click=True Then
 Begin
  SetStats;
  Throwoff;
 End;
 StatCount:=StatCount+1
 StatTimes:=StatTimes+1
 PauseCount:=PauseCount+1
 If PauseCount>4+Random(9) Then
  Begin
   Status('Pausing...')
   Wait(20000+Random(5000)-Random(5000)+Random(7000))
   Scatter;
  End;
 If StatTimes>1+Random(2) then
  begin
   Scatter;
   StatTimes:=0
  end;
 Wait(400+Random(375))
 WhichStats:=Random(4)
  Case WhichStats Of
   1:
    Begin
     MoveMouseSmooth(559+Random(69),213+Random(19))
     Status('Checking Attack!');
    End;
   2:
    Begin
     MoveMouseSmooth(623+Random(50),212+Random(19))
     Status('Checking Hits!');
    End;
   3:
    Begin
     MoveMouseSmooth(560+Random(50),244+Random(40))
     Status('Checking Strength!');
    End;
   4:
    Begin
     MoveMouseSmooth(556+Random(50),209+Random(210))
     Status('Checking Fighting Skills');
    End;
  End;
 Wait(3000+Random(4000))
 Review;
End;

Procedure SpecialAttack;
var
h,j,SPA,SPAStop: integer;
Begin
Status('Running: SpecialAttack;')
 DoSpecial:=0
 SPA:=0
 MoveMouseSmooth(550+Random(19),178+Random(20))
 Wait(10+Random(25))
 GetMousePos(x,y);
 ClickMouse(x,y,true)
 Wait(400+Random(200))
 MoveMouseSmooth(577+Random(140),443+Random(10))
 Wait(10+Random(25))
  Repeat
   SPA:=SPA+1
   GetMousePos(x,y);
   ClickMouse(x,y,true)
   SpecialUsed:=Specialused+1
   Wait(5000+Random(8000))
   Review;
   Status('Running: SpecialAttack;')
    If Not FindColorTolerance(h,j,331155,578,441,590,451,10) Then
     Begin
      SPAStop:=1
     End;
    If Spa=1+Random(3) Then
     Begin
      SPAStop:=1
     End;
  Until(SPAStop=1)
End;
  
Procedure ScreenMove;
Begin
MoveTimes:=0
MouseTimes:=MouseTimes+1
Review;
 Repeat
  Status('Running MouseMode!')
  MoveCount:=MoveCount+1
  MoveTimes:=MoveTimes+1
  RingCount:=RingCount+1
  MouseMode:=True
  ScatterMode:=False
  Review;
  Wait(500+Random(11000))
  MM:=Random(5)
   Case MM Of
   1:
    Begin
     MoveMouseSmooth(0+Random(534),0+Random(335))
    End;
   2:
    Begin
     MoveMouseSmooth(0+Random(534),0+Random(335))
     Wait(100+Random(300)+Random(70))
     MoveMouseSmooth(0+Random(534),0+Random(335))
    End;
   3:
    Begin
     DoSpecial:=DoSpecial+1
     If SpecialOn=True Then
      Begin
       If DoSpecial=2+Random(8) Then
        Begin
         SpecialAttack;
        End;
      End;
    MoveMouseSmooth(0+Random(762),0+Random(500))
    End;
   4:
    Begin
     MoveMouseSmooth(0+Random(762),0+Random(500))
     Wait(100+Random(300)+Random(70))
     MoveMouseSmooth(0+Random(762),0+Random(500))
    End;
    5:
    Begin
     MoveMouseSmooth(0+Random(534),0+Random(335))
     Wait(300+Random(70))
     MoveMouseSmooth(0+Random(534),0+Random(335))
     Wait(100+Random(300)+Random(70))
     MoveMouseSmooth(0+Random(534),0+Random(335))
     Wait(100+Random(300)+Random(70))
     MoveMouseSmooth(0+Random(534),0+Random(335))
    End;
   End;
  Review;
  RandomEventCheck;
  If FindColorTolerance(x,y,16711680,133,438,160,445,10) then
   begin
    PauseScript;
   end;
  If RingOn=True Then
   Begin
    If RingCount>RingNumber Then
     Begin
      Ring;
     End;
    End;
 Until(MoveTimes>5+Random(20))
StatCheck;
End;

Procedure Simple;
var
  a,s: Integer;
  Count,Times: Integer;
Begin
Count:=0
Times:=0
 Repeat
 Count:=Count+1
 Times:=Times+1
 If FindColorTolerance(x,y,16711680,133,438,160,445,10) then
   begin
    PauseScript;
   end;
   if Times>5+Random(10) then
    begin
     MoveMouseSmooth(6+Random(760),6+Random(500))
     Wait(10000+Random(20000))
    end;
   Begin
    GetMousePos(a,s)
    Writeln('Current Moves:   :   ' + IntToStr(Count) + '!')
    Writeln('Mouse Position:  :   ' + IntToStr(A) + ':' + IntToStr(s) + '!')
    Writeln('')
    Writeln('')
    Writeln('')
    Writeln('')
    Writeln('')
  End;
  GetMousePos(a,s)
  Status('Mouse Position: ' + IntToStr(A) + ':' + IntToStr(s) + '')
  Wait(5000)
  GetMousePos(a,s)
  MoveMouseSmooth(a+Random(10),s+Random(10))
  Wait(10000+Random(20000))
 Until(false);
End;

{Script Start}
Begin
Setup;
Writeln('')
Writeln('')
Writeln('  + By Bumis')
Writeln('  + Setup: Line 23')
Writeln('    - Anti-Logout 2.2 {March 12, 2006)')
Writeln('')
Wait(2000+Random(200))
If Combat=True Then
 Begin
  FightSetPro;
 End;
If Mode=True Then
  Begin
   MoveCount:=0
   PauseCount:=0
   ScatterCount:=0;
   DoSpecial:=0;
   StatTimes:=0
   EnterCM:=0
   RingCount:=0
   Specialused:=0
   ReviewCount:=0
   RingNumber:=RingNumber+Random(5)
   ScatterMode:=False;
   MouseMode:=False;
   Paused:=False;
    Repeat
     Wait(200+Random(145))
     ScreenMove;
     Wait(200+Random(2350))
    Until(false)
  End;
   
If Mode=False Then
  Begin
   Simple;
  End;
End.

Read full topic
